channel.title: The AdventureWire podCast featuring: snowboarding, skiing, skateboarding, surfing, and adventure travel
channel.description: All Star Adventures podCast features: tales from our instructional adventure travel trips in snowboarding, skateboarding, skiing and surfing. Our PodCast is updated monthly. PodCast features special segments like trick tips, resort and terrain park reviews, featured skateparks, featured destinations, and travel specials. PodCast is filmed in mutiple mediums including digital, 8mm, Hi-8, and others. Please join us as a subscriber!
channel.itunes:author: enquiry@allstartrips.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: All Star Adventures PodCast is a show highlighting some of our adventure travel trips and locations. The show also features snowboarding, skiing, skateboarding, and surfing
channel.itunes:summary: All Star Adventures PodCast is a show all about our fun adventure travels. The show features our clients, friends, and coaches at locations around the globe. Our instructional adventure travels are offered in our focus sports of snowboarding, skateboarding, skiing, mountain biking, snowmobiling and surfing in New Zealand, North America, South America, Mexico, Grand Cayman, and Australia.
